Mercedes Rios Sono

A major strategy shift was announced today by ESISERVIS Head Mercedes Rios Sono. “The most important aspect of this strategy service by ESISERVIS was a higher degree of business with BRIC countries. The situation in Europe is not likely to improve in the near term. There is too much of a cloud in the horizon”, says Mercedes Rios Sono. “The growth is in emerging markets and most notably the BRIC countries. Good days lie ahead for ESISERVIS.”

ESISERVIS S.A.

Major strategy shift announced by ESISERVIS head, Mercedes R

“BRIC countries are where the growth will be and that is where our strategy will focus on from now on”, said Mercedes Rios Sono, head of ESISERVIS during a press conference held this morning in Guayaquil Ecuador’s Hilton Colon Hotel. There is too much uncertainty for Europe and the US is likely to be a laggard. The election year in the US and the debt crisis in Europe are going to make it very difficult for major economic stimulus to take place. Given this absence of meaningful action on the part of central banks and governments in the US in Europe, the only good option left are the BRIC countires and that is where ESISERVIS will focus from now on.”

Ingeniera Mercedes Rios Sono

Important appointment for ESISERVIS chief, Mercedes Rios Son

Mercedes Rios Sono has been appointed as buyer mandate for an important international consortium. “This is an excellent appointment and one that is at par with ESISERVIS’s potential and professionalism” We are finishing up the details, dotting the I’s and crossing out the T’s and we will shall then disclose the name of the company we now represent. You can bet that this is going to make headlines but for now we need to maintain confidentiality, said ESISERVIS head Mercedes Rios Sono.

Mercedes Rios Sono

ESISERVIS head, Mercedes Rios Sono obtains important appoint

A very important appointment has been made for ESISERVIS head Mercedes Rios Sono. “This is going to make headlines once the company we now represent is disclosed” stared Mercedes Rios Sono during a press conference held in Guayaquil’s Hilton Colon Hotel. The press conference also focused on the major strategy shift for ESISERVIS, one that will focus more of the firm’s time energy and human capital on BRIC country investments.

Head, Mercedes Rios Sono, mentioned the significance of these factors in a Press Conference held at Guayaquil’s Hilton Colon Hotel. “These are exciting times and the opportunities are huge for those who know where and when to act” stated Mercedes Rios Sono.

Important mandate appointment goes to ESISERVIS head Mercede

During a press conference that focused on the major strategy shift for ESISERVIS as well as an important appointment as buyer mandate for the company’s head, Mercedes Rios Sono, focused on several important topics for the company going forward. “A strategy shift has occurred mentioned Mercedes Rios Sono, one that brings makes us more dependent on BRIC countries and less dependent on Europe and the US. Times will be good for those who know when and where to act.”

Ingeniera Mercedes Rios

Market still has opportunities says ESISERVIS head Mercedes

“Many people have almost surrendered and stopped looking due to the lack of opportunities, but that is mostly because they don’t know where to find the opportunities”, said Mercedes Rios Sono, head of ESISERVIS during a press conference held at the Hilton Colon Hotel in Guayaquil Ecuador. During this conference Mercedes Rios spoke about different topics, including the firms incursion in commodities, an area that the company believes will continue to be strong globally, especially in BRIC countries.

Ingeniera Mercedes Rios Sono

Company continues to thrive says ESISERVIS head Mercedes Rio

While many companies have suffered in this economy, ESISERVIS has been able to weather the storm and sees the opportunity to continue to thrive going forward. Mercedes Rios Sono, head of ESISERVIS mentioned that the firm will focus on countries like Brazil, Russia, China and India. This is a megatrend that will probably continue for the next 30 to 50 year and it is time for smart people to hop on the bandwagon. We now live in an economy that, while it may not have ‘decoupled’ entirely, it is certainly not dependent on the United States as much as it was a decade or two ago. Countries need to diverisify their portfolio of clients and foster trade with new markets.

ESISERVIS S.A.

Growth Trend Will Continue for next 30-50 years in BRIC coun

The megatrend of BRIC countries outpacing the US and European economies is a trend that will likely continue for the next 30 to 50 years, said Mercedes Rios Sono, head of ESISERVIS. It is time for more companies to jump on the bandwagon, said Mercedes Rios Sono during a conference held in the port city of Guayaquil, Ecuador’s main trading hub. It is time to diversify, but also time to focus on growth. One does not diversify to find laggard economies. One diversifies in order to find new diamonds. And the process of optimizing your portfolio requires throwing out the laggards, and using the time it frees up to look for new opportunities.

Ingeniera Mercedes Rios Sono
